revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Powerup | name = Map | class = StrifeMap | game = Strife | doomednum = 2026 | spawnid = 137 | spawnname = T_COMPUTERMAP | convid = 164, 160, 163 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:MapRevealer|MapRevealer]]→SuperMap
Strife's map. Reveals all the unexplored areas with gray lines. In Strife1.wad, the sprites are actually named PMAP* and are [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR StrifeMap : {{Class|MapRevealer}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.PickupSound}} "misc/p_pkup" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_STRIFEMAP" // "You picked up the map." States { Spawn: SMAP AB 6 Bright Loop } }
